int SkySampleCmd ( ClientData  clientdata,

)

Handler procedure for the tpk::skysample command.

The skysample command generates a list of star coordinates randomly placed around the target position being tracked by a mount virtual telescope. The first star in the list is always at the target position and all lie within one arc-minute of that position. The form of the command is

  • skysample <mount> <number>
